details.title: Quantization and Saturation Noise Due to Analog-to-Digital Conversion
details.abstract: This correspondence carries out an analysis of the noise power generated by a saturating A/D converter when the input signal has an assumed Gaussian probability density function. Two noise powers are found to contribute to the output device noise, i e., one due to quantization effects and one due to saturation effects. The results of this analysis should have application to a broad class of radar and sonar problems.
details.journal_title: IEEE Transactions on Aerospace and Electronic Systems
